unnormalised: Borem, konnem tori veg-vegllea voizki padvichea modem aslolo farok vixim vicharlem. Tem ek chodd korun ieupi proxn, dekhun ami tem soddun spoxtt kortolim, khas korun vostu thoddeo ghonchogondoll zata, nhoi?
normalised: Barobar, konnem tori vegvegllea voizki padvinche madli antarache vixim vicharlem. Tem ekdum sadharan proxn asa, dekhun ami tem futtoun sangum-ia, khas korun vostu thodi gondollachi zatat, mhunn na?

unnormalised: Poilem mhollear, tumkam “Dr.” asat – Doctoracho laguchor akxori sobdo. Bharotant MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery) digri aslolo konnui, vo her dexantle equivalent MD (Doctor of Medicine) vo DO (Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine) digri aslolo konnui apnnachea nanva poilim “Dr.” vapru yeta. Dr. Sharma Apollo Clinicant tumcho general physician asunk xakta, vo Dr. Khan rostentolem pilleanche doctor asunk xakta. Tanchem voizki digri purnn zalam mhonn tachem orth zata.
normalised: Poile suvater, tumkam sadhem "Dr." asa - Doctorachem kurtupeponn. Bharotantlea M-B-B-S (Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery) digree aslelea konnakui, vo dusrea dexantlean samka M-D (Doctor of Medicine) vo D-O (Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine) digree aslelea konnakui "Dr." aplim navanchea mukar vaprunk zata. Doctor Sharma Apollo Clinicant tumcho sadharan voizak asunk xakta, vo Doctor Khan ulicantlea bhurgeanchea voizak asunk xakta. Tanchem voizki digree purnn zalea mhunn taka ort asa.

unnormalised: Atam, vostu thoddeo odik ruchik zata. MBBS uprant, choddxe doctor zannkar zaunk fuddem veta. Te MD (Doctor of Medicine, punn postgraduate ek!), MS (Master of Surgery), vo DNB (Diplomate of National Board) sarkhi post-graduate digri kortole. Dekhun, Dr. Gupta interno organsacho rog nidan korpacho zannkar korun tannem Internal Medicinen MD gheunk xakta. Vo, Dr. Patelak General Surgeryn MS asunk xakta, mhonnlear to ek gunnvan surgeon asa. Dr. Iyerak Cardiologyant DNB dhorunk xakta.
normalised: Atam, vostu thodi chodd ruchik zata. M-B-B-S uprant, zaitim voizak lok vechponn korunk fuddem votat. Te M-D (Doctor of Medicine, punn postgraduate ek!), M-S (Master of Surgery), vo D-N-B (Diplomate of National Board) sarkhi post-graduate digree kortole. Dekhun, Doctor Guptak Internal Medicineant M-D asunk xakta, ani tem tondrushtintlea avoyvanche rog nirdharan korunk ani upchar korunk ek vechponn kortat. Vo, Doctor Patel General Surgeryant M-S asunk xakta, mhunnlear te ek patraxil'l surgon. Doctor Iyerachea hatant Cardiologyant D-N-B asunk xakta.

unnormalised: Uprant tumkam super-specialist asat. Te aplea MD vo MS uprant fuddem training kortat. Udharonnak, konnek Internal Medicinen MD asa tannem Cardiologynt DM (Doctorate of Medicine – ghonchogondoll, mhaka khobor asa!) korunk xakta. Vo, General Surgerynt MS aslolo surgeon Neurosurgerynt MCh (Magister Chirurgiae – Master of Surgery, punn super-specializationakhatir) korunk xakta. Dekhun, Dr. Verma Neurologynt DM asunk xakta, to brain ani nervous systemant zannkar asa. Dr. Singh Plastic Surgerynt MCh asunk xakta.
normalised: Uprant tumkam super-specialists astat. Te apli M-D vo M-S uprant fuddem training kortat. Udharonn diunk, je konnem Internal Medicineant M-D keli taka Cardiologyant D-M (Doctorate of Medicine – gondollachem, hanv zannam!) korunk mellta. Vo, General Surgeryant M-S aslelea ek surgonak Neurosurgeryant M-Ch (Magister Chirurgiae – Master of Surgery, punn super-specializationakhatir) korunk mellta. Dekhun, Doctor Verma Neurologyant D-M asunk xakta, ani tem buddhi ani cheta sansthent vechponn korta. Doctor Singh Plastic Surgeryant M-Ch asunk xakta.

unnormalised: Toxench, “Prof.” sarkhea titlecher lokx dovrat. Hem sadharonnponnan te voizki collegeant professor asat ani voizki vyavsay korpachea barabor xikopantui somil'l asat mhonn arth zata. Prof. Banerjee, udharonnakhatir, AIIMS Delhicho Cardiology vibhagacho mukheli asunk xakta. Tanka chodd anubhav asta ani te aplea kxetrant fuddari astat.
normalised: Toxench, "Prof." sarkhea padvincher dollo dovrat. Hem samanyponnan tem medical kolejint professor asat ani voizki vixinche xikxa divpant toxench practice kortat. Professor Banerjee, dekhik diunk, A-I-I-M-S Delhichea Cardiology vibhagacho mukheli asunk xakta. Tanche lagim zaitim anubhao astat ani te tanchea kxetrache fuddari astat.

unnormalised: "Registrar" ani "Resident" trainingacho zago asat. Resident mhollear sadharonnponnan post-graduate trainingachea survatechea vorsantlo konnui, zalear Registrar thoddo odik senior asta. Donui senior doctoram ani zannkaranchea dekhrekhekhala kam kortat, anubhav melloun ani aplem koxolyo odik ghott kortat. Tum Dr. Reddy-k Neurology deptant Registrar mhonn vo Dr. Kumar-ak Internal Medicinen Resident mhonn polleun xakta.
normalised: "Registrar" ani "Resident" trainingache suvato astat. Ek Resident sadharonponnan apli post-graduate trainingache survechea vorsantlo konnui asta, zalear ek Registrar thodo chodd senior asta. Te dogui senior doctoram ani specialistanchea tabent kam kortat, anubhao joddttat ani apli kuxaltai ani vaddoitat. Tumkam Doctor Reddy Neurology vibhagant Registrar mhunn vo Doctor Kumar Internal Med-ant Resident mhunn distok xakta.

unnormalised: Xevttak, alternative medicinachea voizkam korpeankui tankam aplea kxetrant manyota asloli digri astanam "Dr." vaprunk mellta, zoxem BAMS (Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery) vo BHMS (Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery). Dekhun, Dr. Trivedi ek Ayurvedic doctor asunk xakta zann herbal upai suchoita. Te upchar kortat tea medicinacho prokar zanno asop gorjechem asa. Fokot ugodas dovrat, te "Dr." title vapurta astanam, tanchem training ani upchar allopathic (adhunik voizki) doctoram-von vegolle astat. Dekhun Dr. Kapoor MD asa vo BHMS graduate mhonn zannam zaunk gorjechem asa.
normalised: Nimanne suvater, alternative voizacho abhyas korpi asunk xaktat je apli kxetrint मान्य digree aslear "Dr." vaprunk xaktat, zoxem B-A-M-S (Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery) vo B-H-M-S (Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery). Dekhun, Doctor Trivedi ek Ayurvedic doctor asunk xakta ani voizki vonspati dakoita. Te voizechea prakarak zannam zaunk gorjechem asa. Fokot ugddas dovrat, te "Dr." padvi vapartat zaleari, tanchem training ani upchar allopathic (modern voiz) doctoram von vegllim astat. Dekhun Doctor Kapoor ek M-D vo B-H-M-S podvidharok asa mhunn zannam zaunk gorjechem asa.

unnormalised: Axea asa hem thodem spoxtt karta! Tumchea bholaike vixim tum konnak bhett kortat tem zanno asop sodanch borem.
normalised: Axem asa, hem thoddem vornn korta! Tumchea tondrusti vixin tumi konnak pollottat tem zannam zaunk sodanch borem.
